Hello,Thank you for your question on Healthcare Magic.I can understand your concern. You are having symptoms of acute bronchitis. You should take steam inhalation and warm saline gargles twice daily. You should take anti-inflammatory analgesics like ibuprofen or diclofenac for pain relief. Avoid smoking and alcohol. You should take inhaled bronchodilators like salbutamol or ipratropium for symptomatic relief. You should take antibiotics like amoxicillin, azithromycin or clarithromycin for 7 days. You should take antacids like omeprazole or pantoprazole for acid reflux. You should take cough syrup like dextromethorphan and guaifenesin. You should take paracetamol for fever and pain. You should take antiallergic drugs like cetrizine or levocetrizine for allergic cough. You should take antihistamines like loratadine or cetrizine for allergic symptoms. Hope I have solved your query. I will be happy to help you further. Wish you good health. Thanks.
